title: To a Riot Designer - I would rather sit in queue longer then be  forced into auto filled
body:
In all honesty when it comes to competitive games, I would rather sit in queue for 3~4 more minutes then spend 25~30 minutes playing a role I don't excel in. 

I think it would be a beneficial design to allow players to opt out to the autofill functionality at the cost of there own time. No one can blame riot if they provided the option. Especially when it comes to critical games like provisional or matches that put you into promos. 

Also when it comes to player dissatisfaction, allowing the option of opting out of autofill is better then forcing autofill. 

In a competitive team environment adding such uncertainty by forcing a player to play a less then optimal role, will drag the entire team down. Additionally if they are facing and opponent who does excel in the role, it creates an unfair match up. 

Also there is no real reward for succeeding in an forced auto filled position. You don't gain additional LP, nor are you protected from losing LP when you had no choice in the matter. 

I know that there are efforts being made to reduce auto fill, but it really sucks when you queue for mid or top and end up being forced to play jungle.
